vfxs.description: A collection of all visual effects (VFX) in the game, defining their properties and behaviors.

facing.description: Direction the VFX should face when spawned.

spawn_location.description: Location where the VFX should be spawned relative to its target.

vfx_left.description: Reference to the left-facing GameObject asset for this VFX.

vfx_right.description: Reference to the right-facing GameObject asset for this VFX.

items.description: A VFX definition that specifies the properties and behaviors of a visual effect in the game.
